transactions.title: Your Transaction History
transactions.no_transactions_1: You haven't made any transactions yet.
transactions.no_transactions_2: Fund your checking account or make an investment to get started.

main_account.title: Your Checking Account
main_account.description_1: Be the true owner of your funds; only you have the ability to interact with your sovereign checking account.
main_account.description_2: You can move money from it to your rewarding accounts.

investment_account.title: Your Investments
investment_account.description_1: This investment behaves like a savings account, but better!
investment_account.description_2: Lock in your funds and earn interest from the first minute. Exit at any time.
investment_account.disclaimer: Estimated annual yield and not guaranteed.

transaction.title: This Operation Requires Your Attention
transaction.description: You are about to move {{amount}}{{currency}} from your checking account to your rewarding account. Are you sure you want to continue?

offramp.title: Withdraw from Your Account
offramp.subtitle: You can retrieve funds from your account by withdrawing via debit card, bank transfer, or Google Pay.
